languages.text: {n}Палач столбенеет. Край его рта дергается.{/n} "Вот как... значит, тот, кто верой и правдой служил Фесмофориусу, теперь сам же войдет в его нутро..."
languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor, в это время FW_Knight_name выходит на середину помоста, опускается на колено (можем сделать уникальный блюпринт с отличающейся внешкой главного военачальника)

traits.locale_text: "Тургулак Неустрашимый, подойди". {n}Мрачно приказывает губернатор. Один из рыцарей выходит вперед и опускается на колено.{/n} "Ты предал священную клятву защищать своего господина и господина своего господина, Вольного Торговца, служа мечом и щитом Империуму — и во тьме, и во крови!"

languages.translation_comment: FW_FakeGovernor, в это время FW_Knight_name выходит на середину помоста, опускается на колено (можем сделать уникальный блюпринт с отличающейся внешкой главного военачальника)

languages.text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."
languages.original_text: {n}Палач столбенеет. Край его рта дергается.{/n} "Вот как... значит, тот, кто верой и правдой служил Фесмофориусу, теперь сам же войдет в его нутро..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."
{n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

"Turgulak the Undaunted, approach." {n}One of the knights steps forward and drops to one knee.{/n} "You have broken your sacred oath to protect your lord and your lord's {mf|lord|lady}, the Rogue Trader, serving the Imperium with sword and shield — in darkness and in blood!"
{n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."
{n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."
{n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."
{n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

languages.text: {n}刽子手僵住了，嘴角不住地抽搐着。{/n}“看来，那个曾心怀正义与热情，侍奉菲斯摩弗瑞斯的人，如今自己也要进入他炽热的怀抱了……”
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}刽子手僵住了，嘴角不住地抽搐着。{/n}“看来，那个曾心怀正义与热情，侍奉菲斯摩弗瑞斯的人，如今自己也要进入他炽热的怀抱了……”

languages.text: {n}El verdugo se queda paralizado, y la comisura de sus labios se crispa.{/n} «Entonces yo, que he servido al fesmoforio con más rigor y entrega que nadie, debo someterme ahora a su soplo abrasador...».
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El verdugo se queda paralizado, y la comisura de sus labios se crispa.{/n} «Entonces yo, que he servido al fesmoforio con más rigor y entrega que nadie, debo someterme ahora a su soplo abrasador...».

languages.text: {n}Cellat donakalıyor, ağzının kenarı seğiriyor.{/n} "Demek Pesmoforyus'a azim ve şevkle hizmet eden, şimdi bizzat onun ateşli kucağına girecek..."
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cellat donakalıyor, ağzının kenarı seğiriyor.{/n} "Demek Pesmoforyus'a azim ve şevkle hizmet eden, şimdi bizzat onun ateşli kucağına girecek..."

languages.text: {n}司令官は固まり、彼の口の隅がけいれんする。{/n}「厳正さと熱意をもってフェスモフォリウスに奉仕してきた者が今度は自身がその灼熱の抱擁に身を投じなければならないということか…」
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}司令官は固まり、彼の口の隅がけいれんする。{/n}「厳正さと熱意をもってフェスモフォリウスに奉仕してきた者が今度は自身がその灼熱の抱擁に身を投じなければならないということか…」

languages.text: {n}Le bourreau se fige, un tic nerveux agitant le coin de sa bouche.{/n} « Or donc, celui qui a servi le Phesmophorius avec zèle et rigueur doit à présent s'abandonner à son tour à son étreinte brûlante... »
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le bourreau se fige, un tic nerveux agitant le coin de sa bouche.{/n} « Or donc, celui qui a servi le Phesmophorius avec zèle et rigueur doit à présent s'abandonner à son tour à son étreinte brûlante... »

languages.text: {n}Der Henker erstarrt. Seine Mundwinkel zucken.{/n} "Der Mann, der dem Phesmophorius mit Eifer und Strenge diente, muss sich nun also selbst in dessen flammende Umarmung begeben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The executioner freezes, the corner of his mouth twitching.{/n} "So, the one who served the Phesmophorius with rigour and zeal must now himself enter its fiery embrace..."
